newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Dhaka stocks end up as investors buy blue chips.
newsitem.headline: Dhaka stocks end up as investors buy blue chips.

text.p: Dhaka stocks closed higher as investors bought blue chips in pharmaceutical, cement and food sectors, brokers said.

The Dhaka Stock Exchange (DSE) all-share price index rose 19.66 points or 1.6 percent at 1,193.85 on a turnover of 136.3 million taka. Of the total issues traded 72 closed higher, 62 ended lower and two remained unchanged.
Singer Bangladesh rose 15.56 taka to 10,526.29, Bangladesh Tobacco Company gained 9.0 to 149, BOC Bangladesh rose 5.18 to 244.25 and Confidence Cement was up 48.57 to 783.67.
